sub_fields.label: Call To Action
sub_fields.name: cta_link
sub_fields.instructions: This will appear on the right side of the navigation.

sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: two_column_video_feature_background_image
sub_fields.instructions: Select a background image for the video feature area

sub_fields.label: Testimonial Byline
sub_fields.name: testimonial_byline
sub_fields.instructions: Suggested format: First Name, Last Name, Title

sub_fields.label: Section ID
sub_fields.name: section_id
sub_fields.instructions: Used if you need sticky navigation

sub_fields.label: Intro Paragraph
sub_fields.name: intro_paragraph
sub_fields.instructions: This is the intro paragraph for the CTA, it appears under the H2

sub_fields.label: Call To Action Link
sub_fields.name: call_to_action_link
sub_fields.instructions: This is the call to action link that appears under the intro paragraph

sub_fields.label: Equation Left Side Sub Text
sub_fields.name: equation_left_side_sub_text
sub_fields.instructions: Sub that appears under the left side of the equation

sub_fields.label: Equation Operator
sub_fields.name: equation_operator
sub_fields.instructions:
The operator between the left and right side of the equation:
$20/month [+] 3.5% + 30 ¢

sub_fields.label: Equation Right Side Sub Text
sub_fields.name: equation_right_side_sub_text
sub_fields.instructions: Sub that appears under the left side of the equation

sub_fields.label: Outro Wyswig
sub_fields.name: outro_wyswig
sub_fields.instructions: The outro text for the equation Widget, it is a WYSWIG free form area

sub_fields.label: Section Id
sub_fields.name: section_id
sub_fields.instructions: If you're including a background image, you need to define a section ID
